Class LQSRule

java.lang.Object
tcore.Primitive
tcore.CompositionPrimitive
tcore.Composer
rules.LRule
rules.LQSRule
public class LQSRule
extends LRule
Applies an inner rule for each match of the LHS as long as matches can be found. // FIXME: 2017-12-13 Does not work with current "random" iterator...

Pierre-Olivier Talbot
